PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2012-15382012-11-22,  ,  ,  PS, 
ActCorrections and Conditional Release Act
PrecisReappointment of LOUIS-PHILIPPE McGRAW of Moncton, New Brunswick, as a full-time member of the Parole Board of Canada, Atlantic Regional Division, to hold office during good behaviour for a term of five years; and designation of LOUIS-PHILIPPE McGRAW as Vice-Chairperson of the Parole Board of Canada, Atlantic Regional Division, effective February 11, 2013.
AttachmentsAttachment
